place.name: ORMISTON
place.gazetteerText: Ormiston, par. and vil. with ry. sta., W. Haddingtonshire - par., 3444 ac., pop. 1026; vil., on river Tyne, 3 miles SE. of Tranent and 12 miles SE. of Edinburgh, pop. 378; P.O.; Rev. Robert Moffat, D.D. (1797-1883), the African missionary, was a native; Ormiston Hall is a seat of the Earl of Hopetoun. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
